headline: Why Are Coinbase (COIN) Shares Soaring Today
summary: Shares of blockchain infrastructure company Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) jumped 10.1% in the morning session after sentiment in the crypto market improved as the company announced the official launch of U.S. stock and exchange-traded fund (ETF) trading for all users in the United States, a key milestone in its mission to become the world's first “Everything Exchange.”

headline: Bitcoin’s Brutal Pullback Has ARKB Investors Searching for Answers
summary: The ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF (CBOE:ARKB) offers investors a straightforward proposition: direct, regulated exposure to Bitcoin’s price with no leverage, no options mechanics, and a competitive 0.21% expense ratio. The problem it solves is access. Before spot Bitcoin ETFs launched in January 2024, getting clean Bitcoin exposure inside a brokerage account meant dealing with futures-based ... Bitcoin’s Brutal Pullback Has ARKB Investors Searching for Answers

headline: Coinbase Stock Is Down 27% But Analysts Still See a Turnaround Coming
summary: A wildly popular cryptocurrency exchange, Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) shares jumped 16% on February 13 following the company’s Q4 2025 earnings report, a rally that suggests investors may finally be looking past Coinbase’s reputation as a pure bitcoin proxy. Despite the stock still being down 26% over the past month, the post-earnings bounce suggests investors are beginning ... Coinbase Stock Is Down 27% But Analysts Still See a Turnaround Coming
